items.raw_desc: PC játék Someday You'll Return: Director's Cut - PC DIGITAL: Psychological horrorHow far are you willing to go if your daughter doesn't come home? When every minute without her brings new layers of despair and fear becomes your only companion, the lines between reality and nightmare begin to blur. Face a difficult choiceSomeday You'll Return: Director's Cut PC confronts you with this ruthless question and takes you into the depths of the Moravian forests, where nothing is as it seems. You will face not only unknown threats in nature, but also the darkness within yourself. LOSTWhat are you willing to sacrifice for another? When your daughter goes missing, you instinctively know you'll do anything to get her back. But how far are you willing to go? At a moment when all hope is lost and every road looks like a dead end, the question remains: what are you willing to sacrifice to look her in the eye again?...
